reviewComments: Our son attends the nearby UC, and the local literature recommended a tour of the "worlds largest cheese factory". We expected something along the lines of a winery or other... read more
On Friday there's a lunch special, (I think it's $9), for a large Tri-tip sandwich, potato salad, beans & a drink! Everything you want to add to the sandwich and a nice inside and... read more
The gift shop is lovely, I stop for coffee on my way to Gustine often. Lunch menu is great. Our group is planning at our in October
